title: DELTARUNE Character Encyclopedia - Kris, Susie, Ralsei Complete Character Guide
description: Complete DELTARUNE character encyclopedia featuring Kris, Susie, Ralsei, Noelle and other main characters with detailed introductions, ability analysis, story backgrounds and development progression in DELTARUNE.
keywords: DELTARUNE characters, Kris, Susie, Ralsei, Noelle, character encyclopedia, character guide, character abilities, story background, DELTARUNE

hero.title: DELTARUNE CHARACTER ENCYCLOPEDIA
hero.subtitle: Deep dive into each character's abilities, background and story development

abilities.title: Combat Abilities
list: ‚Ä¢ Red Buster - Basic attack skill in DELTARUNE

background.title: Story Background
background.description: Kris is the only human in the small town, adopted by Toriel and Asgore in DELTARUNE. They grew up with Asriel, but now Asriel has gone to college. Kris is relatively lonely at school until being drawn into Dark World adventures. As a character controlled by the 'Soul', Kris experiences complex struggles with identity throughout DELTARUNE's story.

abilities.title: Combat Abilities
list: ‚Ä¢ Rude Buster - Signature attack in DELTARUNE
‚Ä¢ Red Buster - Cooperation skill with Kris

traits.title: Character Traits
list: ‚Ä¢ Rough exterior, kind heart in DELTARUNE

background.title: Story Background
background.description: Susie initially was the problem student at school in DELTARUNE, known for bullying and intimidation. She lived on society's margins, lacking true friends. Through Dark World adventures in DELTARUNE, Susie learned the importance of friendship, gradually growing from a lone 'bad kid' into an indispensable team member. Her growth arc is central to the entire DELTARUNE story.

abilities.title: Combat Abilities
list: ‚Ä¢ Heal Prayer - Healing spells in DELTARUNE

traits.title: Character Traits
list: ‚Ä¢ Gentle and kind, pacifist in DELTARUNE

background.title: Story Background
background.description: Ralsei is the prince of the Dark World in DELTARUNE, alone guarding an empty castle. He seems very knowledgeable about Light World situations and guides Kris and Susie on their adventure. Ralsei's true identity and motives remain mysterious in DELTARUNE, but he always aims for peaceful conflict resolution and serves as the team's spiritual pillar.

abilities.title: Combat Abilities
list: ‚Ä¢ IceShock - Basic ice attack in DELTARUNE

traits.title: Character Traits
list: ‚Ä¢ Shy and timid personality in DELTARUNE

background.title: Story Background
background.description: Noelle is Kris's childhood friend in DELTARUNE, coming from a prominent family in town. Her father Rudy is hospitalized, adding stress to her life. Noelle has a crush on Susie and gradually opens up through Dark World adventures in DELTARUNE. Her character development involves overcoming fears and finding inner strength, particularly in the controversial Snowgrave route of DELTARUNE.

toriel.name: üêê Toriel
toriel.description: Kris and Asriel's adoptive mother in DELTARUNE, working as a school teacher. She's protective and caring, often worrying about Kris's wellbeing in the DELTARUNE storyline.

asgore.name: üëë Asgore
asgore.description: Former king and Kris's adoptive father in DELTARUNE. Now runs a flower shop and maintains a complex relationship with Toriel following their separation in the DELTARUNE universe.

alphys.name: ü¶é Alphys
alphys.description: School science teacher in DELTARUNE, known for her nervousness and scientific expertise. She plays a smaller but important role in the DELTARUNE storyline compared to Undertale.

undyne.name: üêü Undyne
undyne.description: Police chief in DELTARUNE's town, known for her intense and aggressive personality. She maintains law and order while being somewhat suspicious of unusual activities in DELTARUNE.

sans.name: üíÄ Sans
sans.description: Mysterious skeleton who appears as a shopkeeper in DELTARUNE. His role and knowledge about the Dark Worlds remain enigmatic throughout the DELTARUNE story.

papyrus.name: üíÄ Papyrus
papyrus.description: Sans's brother in DELTARUNE, enthusiastic and optimistic. He hasn't appeared directly in DELTARUNE chapters yet but is frequently mentioned by other characters.

krisAndSusie.title: Kris & Susie
krisAndSusie.description: Their friendship develops from fear to trust in DELTARUNE. Susie learns to care for others through her bond with Kris, while Kris finds someone who accepts them unconditionally.

krisAndRalsei.title: Kris & Ralsei
krisAndRalsei.description: A complex relationship in DELTARUNE where Ralsei seems to know more about Kris than he reveals. Their bond involves guidance, trust, and mysterious connections to the Dark World.

susieAndNoelle.title: Susie & Noelle
susieAndNoelle.description: Noelle's crush on Susie drives character development in DELTARUNE. Susie gradually softens her tough exterior around Noelle, showing genuine care and protection.

krisAndNoelle.title: Kris & Noelle
krisAndNoelle.description: Childhood friends in DELTARUNE with shared memories and experiences. Their relationship becomes complicated when player choices affect Noelle's actions, especially in alternate routes.

growth.title: üå± Character Growth
growth.description: DELTARUNE characters undergo significant development throughout the chapters. Each character faces personal challenges and grows through their Dark World experiences, making DELTARUNE's character development one of its strongest elements.

themes.title: üìñ Character Themes
list: ‚Ä¢ The impact of player choice on character fate
‚Ä¢ Balance between individual will and external control

choices.title: üîÄ Player Choice Impact
choices.description: Player decisions significantly affect character relationships and development in DELTARUNE. The game explores how external control (player input) influences character agency and personal growth, creating a unique meta-narrative experience.

magicSystem.title: üîÆ Magic System
magicSystem.description: DELTARUNE features a unique magic system where characters learn new abilities through story progression and relationship development. Each character's magical abilities reflect their personality and role in the team.

teamwork.title: ü§ù Teamwork Mechanics
teamwork.description: DELTARUNE emphasizes cooperative gameplay where characters can combine their abilities for powerful team attacks. Character compatibility and relationship status affect the effectiveness of these cooperative abilities.
